sys_ui_macro.name: save_attachment
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<g:dialog_button title = "Use this button to Save as Attachment" onClick = "save_attachment()" name = "save_attachment" id = "attachment_button" type = "button">Save Attachment</g:dialog_button>
<script>
	function save_attachment(){
	alert('run');
	gsftSubmit(null, g_form.getFormElement(), "attachment_save")
	<!-- var dialog = new GlideDialogWindow('x_amfai_cacmdba_save_ADVOC2DP');
	dialog.setTitle("Saving ADVOC2DP Letter");
	dialog.render(); -->
	}
</script>
</j:jelly>
